entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
